definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: It was an adaptation of Wilson's cloud chamber, filled with nitrogen gas.
sentences.chinese: 這只是對威爾遜氮氣雲室的一種改進。

sentences.english: A lead plate crosses the chamber and evidently the particle has passed through it.
sentences.chinese: 一塊鋁板橫放在雲室中，顯然有粒子穿過鉛板。
